extendedInfo.description: Using cutting edge augmented reality technology, Fatheadâs Big Shot app lets you see a full scale Fathead on your wall before you bring it home!As an added bonus, you can save your image and share on Facebook or Twitter or plan the perfect spot for your new Fathead. More than 50 of our top selling Fatheads are available to choose from!Using the app is simple:1. Print a âwall targetâ image and affix to the location where you want to view an augmented reality Fathead. This printed page is how the Big Shot App knows where to display your Fathead image.2. Select your Image3. Stand 8-10 feet from wall target, hold your phone up to the wall, and view your Fathead!4. Take a photo â share with friends â and buy your favorite Fathead!

reviews.title: It works on my phone, but...
reviews.comment: You have to be so close for sample image to appear, can\'t get a real idea how it will look.  Also, they don\'t have their entire catalog available.  To use it, print the target out, or, one is included with your order. Then, put on wall, I used scotch tape.  Then, select image in app, aim at wall with target and image will suddenly appear. Move closer if image doesn\'t appear at first, THEN you can snap a screenshot of it.  Shrug. Could be a lot better.
reviews.author: Brad Youngkin
